thread.title: Are Nissan, Renault Merging? Nissan Boss Says No

author: Sean McLain
title: Are Nissan, Renault Merging? Nissan Boss Says No
text:
YOKOHAMA, Japanâ€”Nissan Motor Co. Chief Executive Hiroto Saikawa said his company should remain independent, throwing up another obstacle to long-discussed merger talks with alliance partner Renault SA.
Mr. Saikawa is emerging as the most public opponent of a full-blown combination. He said Monday there were no official talks between the two sides currently, but people familiar with the matter said both sides are informally exploring a combination.
...
